subject: Shipment from German warehouse
description_text:
Hi, I have submitted an order with the order number #SSN3782, and I want to
be sure that it will be shipped from your German warehouse. Because I live
in Greece and if the product is shipped from within Europe, I don't have to
pay customs.  Is this correct?

conversations.body_text: Hi Panagiotis Zeppos,    Alright, but our German warehouse is currently out of stock. We expect to restock by the 28th and will ship your order via DHL at that time.

Ok, I don't mind waiting
Thank, you

Στις Τρί 25 Νοε 2025, 04:52 ο χρήστης service@simsonn.com <
service@simsonn.com> έγραψε:

> Hi Panagiotis Zeppos,
>
> Alright, but our German warehouse is currently out of stock. We expect to
> restock by the 28th and will ship your order via DHL at that time.

> live in Greece and if the product is shipped from within Europe, I don't
> have to pay customs.  Is this correct?
>
> 6664:4206036
>

Could you send me the DHL traking number of my order
